    Time is running out to shop Amazon's October Prime Day deals. It's not too late, though: there are still plenty of great discounts to score before the event officially ends at midnight, PT. From Apple smartwatches to personal blenders, there's something for every Prime member shopping this week.

    Amazon's fall Prime event, Big Deal Days, can be a great time to cash in some savings if you don't want to wait until Black Friday. There are great deals from top brands, including Apple, Samsung, PlayStation, LG, and Levi's. You just need to know where to look, which is where we come in. The deals that we've highlighted over the past two days, including the 100+ you can find below, are recommended because of both the quality of the product or brand and the price reduction relative to other past sales. Some top deals have already sold out, but several popular items are still on sale for a few more hours.

    Below, we've compiled the 100+ best Prime Day deals you can get right now. There are sales on everything from MacBooks to Pelotons to Crest White Strips, and much more. Anyone who's an Amazon Prime member can cash in on the savings. If you don't have an account, there's still time to sign up for a 30-day free trial.
